attributes.action: Downgrade the smoking ban to give liscencees to choose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dont get rid of smoking totally, insted leave it up to a controlled amount of liscencees.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Downgrade the smoking ban to give liscencees to choose."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12857.asp

Prime Minister's Office
